name: Nightmares The Beginig
description:
In this game you will be a sleeping person trying to defend your self in your nightmare. Every so often zombie bunnys will spawn in and elephants you will try not to get killed by them by shooting them with a toy gun you have. 

I will update the game a lot I am planning to add a high score board and a in game curancy to get new guns. Until I fullly release Nightmares The Begining it will be free plz donate to e so I can do more with this game.

I am 11 years old and I trying to become a video game maker it is what I've wanted to do for so long. 

Plz give ideas to me on what to add or what to make like adding a score board or making levels to the game.

Any problems with the game plz email me at bobistian04@gmail.com
